statistics.name: BannersSetInAMission
statistics.description: How many banners a player has set on the battlefield in a single mission

statistics.name: ChestsOpenedInAMission
statistics.description: How many treasure chests a player has opened in a single mission

statistics.name: EnemySquadsDestroyedInAMission
statistics.description: How many enemy squads a player has destroyed in a single mission

statistics.name: EnemySquadsDestroyedOverall
statistics.description: Overall number of enemy squads a player has destroyed (in all the campaigns and even using different save slots)

statistics.name: FarmsOwnedInAMission
statistics.description: How many farms a player has under his control at the same time

statistics.name: GoldCollectedInAMission
statistics.description: How many gold a player has collected in a single mission

statistics.name: HordeAllBasicEdictsIssued
statistics.description: Issue all the basic edicts of the Crimson Horde (1 = completed, 0 = not completed)

statistics.name: HordeAllMissionsPerfect
statistics.description: Complete all the Crimson Horde missions with Perfect rating (1 = completed, 0 = not completed)

statistics.name: HordeCampaignComplete
statistics.description: Complete the Crimson Horde campaign (1 = completed, 0 = not completed)

statistics.name: HordeMissionsCompleted
statistics.description: How many missions of Crimson Horde campaign are completed (min = 0, max = 8)

statistics.name: HordeMissionsPerfect
statistics.description: How many missions of the Crimson Horde campaign are completed with Perfect rating (min = 0, max = 8)

statistics.name: HordeRank
statistics.description: Max rank a player achieved in the Crimson Horde campaign (max = 14)

statistics.name: IcedalesAllBasicEdictsIssued
statistics.description: Issue all the basic edicts of the Icedales Cult (1 = completed, 0 = not completed)

statistics.name: IcedalesAllMissionsPerfect
statistics.description: Complete all the Icedales Cult missions with Perfect rating (1 = completed, 0 = not completed)

statistics.name: IcedalesCampaignComplete
statistics.description: Complete the Icedales Cult campaign (1 = completed, 0 = not completed)

statistics.name: IcedalesMissionsCompleted
statistics.description: How many missions of Icedales Cult campaign are completed (min = 0, max = 8)

statistics.name: IcedalesMissionsPerfect
statistics.description: How many missions of the Icedales Cult campaign are completed with Perfect rating (min = 0, max = 8)

statistics.name: IcedalesRank
statistics.description: Max rank a player achieved in the Icedales Cult campaign (max = 14)

statistics.name: MinesOwnedInAMission
statistics.description: How many mines a player has under his control at the same time

statistics.name: MissionsPerfect
statistics.description: How many missions of all the campaigns are completed with Perfect rating (min = 0, max = 24)

statistics.name: ObelisksOwnedInAMission
statistics.description: How many obelisks a player has under his control at the same time

statistics.name: SquadsOwnedInAMission
statistics.description: How many squads a player has under his control at the same time

statistics.name: SquadsPurchasedInAMission
statistics.description: How many squads a player has purchased in a single mission

statistics.name: StrongholdsSiezedInAMission
statistics.description: How many strongholds a player has siezed in a single mission

statistics.name: StrongholdsSiezedOverall
statistics.description: Overall number of strongholds a player has siezed (in all the campaigns and even using different save slots)

statistics.name: UltimatePowerUsedInAMission
statistics.description: How many times a player has used his ultimate power in a single mission

statistics.name: WestariaAllBasicEdictsIssued
statistics.description: Issue all the basic edicts of the Duchy of Westaria (1 = completed, 0 = not completed)

statistics.name: WestariaAllMissionsPerfect
statistics.description: Complete all the Duchy of Westaria missions with Perfect rating (1 = completed, 0 = not completed)

statistics.name: WestariaCampaignComplete
statistics.description: Complete the Duchy of Westaria campaign (1 = completed, 0 = not completed)

statistics.name: WestariaMissionsCompleted
statistics.description: How many missions of Duchy of Westaria campaign are completed (min = 0, max = 8)

statistics.name: WestariaMissionsPerfect
statistics.description: How many missions of the Duchy of Westaria campaign are completed with Perfect rating (min = 0, max = 8)

statistics.name: WestariaRank
statistics.description: Max rank a player achieved in the Duchy of Westaria campaign (max = 14)

statistics.name: XpGainedOverall
statistics.description: Overall number of exp points a player has gained (in all the campaigns and even using different save slots)
